title: Marketplace Dispute Resolved
description: Fired when a marketplace dispute is resolved.

orderId.description: The order identifier associated with the dispute.

resolution.description: The outcome of the dispute resolution.

resolvedBy.description: The party that resolved the dispute.

resolutionAmount.description: The monetary amount of the resolution.

currency.description: ISO 4217 3-letter currency code (e.g. USD, EUR, GBP).

durationSeconds.description: Time from dispute opened to resolution in seconds.
